# References {.unnumbered}

## Package used
Just to see what packages are used here:
```{r results='asis'}
if(!exists(".to.cite")) .to.cite <- NULL
pkgs <- unique(c(.to.cite, .packages()))
cat(paste(pkgs, collapse = ",\t"))
```
